note: Regulation No. 13/2004, subsequently repealed and replaced by Regulation No. 1/2006.3 Currently, the Takeover Directive has been theoretically fully implemented into Romanian law by means of NSC Regulation No. 1/2006, in force as of April 2006, as subsequently amended by NSC Regulation No. 31/2006,4 in force as of January 2007.
